attributes.action: Hold a referendum on reform of the House of Lords. Members of both houses have too many vested interests to decide themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the two Houses of Parliament have too many vested interests to decide the form of the House of Lords by themselves. So a referendum should be held to let the country have its say. Choose from fully elected, fully appointed by political parties, fully appointed by an independant comittee or a combination.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
